nodes.text: Blackie's was the name given by Blackie and Cravel, two thieves, to a junkyard in Vorrnti City that they took over shortly before 9 ABY. They used the yard as a front to fix up a derelict AT-AT walker and use it to steal some spice. Lando Calrissian, an entrepeneur, visited them and thwarted their operation with the help of the New Republic's Katarn Commandos.
